text: María Nieves Rego (born September 6, 1934) is an Argentine tango dancer and choreographer. She worked with her long time dance partner Juan Carlos Copes in the 1983 musical Tango Argentino. She was born in Buenos Aires. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine dancers Category:Choreographers Category:People from Buenos Aires
title: María Nieves
